abilities.name: Death Defied
abilities.description: Innate: Upon taking  fatal damage, Karthus  remains active for 7 seconds, rendering himself unable to move, basic attack, use summoner spells, or activate items, but becoming  untargetable,  invulnerable, and  immune to crowd control for the duration as well as being able to use abilities at no cost.
descriptions: Innate: Upon taking  fatal damage, Karthus  remains active for 7 seconds, rendering himself unable to move, basic attack, use summoner spells, or activate items, but becoming  untargetable,  invulnerable, and  immune to crowd control for the duration as well as being able to use abilities at no cost.
If  Defile has been learned, it will remain toggled on for Death Defied's entire duration.

abilities.name: Lay Waste
abilities.description: Active: Karthus creates a blast at the target location, briefly  revealing the area and detonating after a 0.528 seconds to 0.759 seconds delay, dealing magic damage to all enemies within,  doubled when hitting only one target.
descriptions: Active: Karthus creates a blast at the target location, briefly  revealing the area and detonating after a 0.528 seconds to 0.759 seconds delay, dealing magic damage to all enemies within,  doubled when hitting only one target.
Lay Waste's damage is reduced by 15% against  monsters.
During  Death Defied, Lay Waste will cast at maximum range if cast beyond that.

abilities.name: Wall of Pain
abilities.description: Active: Karthus summons a passable wall of energy at the target location perpendicular to his facing for 5 seconds, granting  sight around its pillars and center.
descriptions: Active: Karthus summons a passable wall of energy at the target location perpendicular to his facing for 5 seconds, granting  sight around its pillars and center.
For the duration, any enemy unit whose  gameplay radius touches it is both  slowed for 4 seconds, decaying over its duration, and  loses 15% magic resistance for the same duration.
Each unit can only be affected once per cast.

abilities.name: Defile
abilities.description: Passive: Karthus restores  mana whenever he kills an enemy.
levelings: Magic Damage Per Tick:»7.5 / 12.5 / 17.5 / 22.5 / 27.5 (+ 5% AP)«Damage Per Second:30 / 50 / 70 / 90 / 110 (+ 20% AP)
descriptions: Passive: Karthus restores  mana whenever he kills an enemy.
Toggle: Karthus deals magic damage every 0.25 seconds to all nearby enemies. Toggling Defile off deals 1 tick's worth of damage.
Defile cannot be toggled off during  Death Defied, but it can be while channeling  Requiem.

abilities.name: Requiem
abilities.description: Active: Karthus  channels for 3 seconds then deals magic damage to all targetable enemy  champions upon its completion.
descriptions: Active: Karthus  channels for 3 seconds then deals magic damage to all targetable enemy  champions upon its completion.

name: Karthus
title: the Deathsinger
blurb: The harbinger of oblivion, Karthus is an undying spirit whose haunting songs are a prelude to the horror of his nightmarish appearance. The living fear the eternity of undeath, but Karthus sees only beauty and purity in its embrace, a perfect union of...
